lines.text: Ailliliú, puilliliú, ailliliú tá an puc ar buile!
lines.translation: Allilu, allilu, allilu, the puck is mad!
lines.grammar: This line uses the imperative mood to express excitement and enthusiasm, with the repetition of "ailliliú" creating a sense of rhythm and emphasis. The phrase "tá an puc ar buile" translates to "the puck is mad", using the present tense to convey a sense of current madness.
